About Me

BIO

I am a full-stack software engineer knowledgable in designing, developing and implementing responsive applications. Educated in social and behavioral sciences, I am passionate about the power technology has to transform our world in a meaningful way and enhance our connection as human beings. I adopt a growth mindset in everything I do and am endlessly excited about strengthening my knowledge and skill set in a way that allows me to continually evolve and innovate as a member of the tech community.

Education

B.S. in Cultural & Media Studies, Eugene Lang College - New York, NY

Advanced Software Engineering Immersive, Hack Reactor at Galvanize - Austin, TX

Technical Skills

Front-End: JavaScript, HTML, CSS, React.js, GraphQL, TypeScript, Sass

Back-End: Node.js, Express, Knex, MongoDB, MySQL, Cassandra, PostgreSQL

Testing/Deployment: Mocha, Chai, Jest, Enzyme, New Relic, Atlas, AWS EBS

Fun Fact! My tripod pitbull, Rainey, looked like an actual Disney character when she was a puppy. She's now officially the sweetest dog you'll ever meet.
